CompositeConfig.Name: FinancialEntry
CompositeConfig.Description: Creates a complete financial transaction (which requires a Header and one or more lines)

Documentation.TagDescription:
**Financial Entry Management**

Create complete financial transactions with headers and multiple line items. Composite endpoint that handles complex financial data entry workflows with automatic transaction key management.

MethodDocumentation.POST: Process complex financial transactions that require both header information and multiple detailed line items. **Automatically handles** transaction linking and validation across all components.
